Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location and very helpful staff!”

Reviews.Content: hotel situated via nazionale 10 minutes walk termini station actually situated 5th floor office block reception ground floor arrived wed 14th april checked map rome told visit staff extremely helpful information shown 5th floor luggage brought pleasantly surprised size bedroom double bed ample space bathroom little size shower situated inside narrow bed people minor issue breakfast morning consisted continental buffet included lot lot hotels ive stayed range juices croissants rolls ham cheese biscuits fruit etc rome volcano iceland erupted time flight cancelled decided france ferry ireland couldnt thank hotel help trying arrange transport contacted hire car companies apparent wouldnt able hire car italy people idea checked train bus websites priced taxi firms beyond hotels guests talking people hotels definitely looked highly receommend hotel lot research hotels booking trip rely tripadvisor posts hotel location walking distance major attractions colosseum roman forum trevi fountain spanish steps patheon etc vatican little river sites 64 bus thats hotel tell buy tickets shop corner accommodation rome expensive hotel miami cheapest location worth rome wouldnt hesitate stay hotel miami
